attributes.action: overturn the eu decision banning motorists from displaying the union flag,cross of st george,welsh dragon and scottish saltire on number plates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is unfair for motorists to not to be able to display the flags of their countrys on their number plates because of clarity,yet you can have the euro flag.I and probably a lot more motorists dont call themselves european but english scottish and welsh.I will always be english even if it is not politically correct.
